name: Games of Yore
description:
A trivia game featuring 8-bit classics

Games of Yore trivia is your chance to step down the memory lane and remember the 8-bit classics from the time of Atari 2600, ZX Spectrum, Commodore 64 and Amiga 500 home computers, but also arcade machines and video game consoles of that era. You don't want to play alone? Invite some friends over, order a pizza and see who remembers the most and can get the highest score. Younger players can explore the amazing world of games that their parents loved to play, and maybe even find the inspiration for a future indie gem!

FEATURES:

  • Over 200 unique questions!
  • Simple trivia user interface that you already know how to use
  • Achievements and online leaderboards

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:

  • Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8 or 10, GNU/Linux
  • 512MB RAM
  • 128MB graphics

DISCLAIMER:

Featured video games titles and other potential trademarks are used for identification purposes only and under a fair use policy.

You can get the latest news about Games of Yore Trivia on Facebook page
